Summary: CONSTANT FUNCTION
fgl_calendar

fglcalendar

Genero Calendar library

This library implements a set of functions to create a calendar area in a WEBCOMPONENT field.

CONSTANT Summary
FGLCALENDAR_THEME_AMAZON INTEGER
FGLCALENDAR_THEME_CHILI INTEGER
FGLCALENDAR_THEME_DEFAULT INTEGER
FGLCALENDAR_THEME_PACIFIC INTEGER
FGLCALENDAR_THEME_SAHARA INTEGER
FGLCALENDAR_THEME_VIOLA INTEGER
FGLCALENDAR_TYPE_DEFAULT INTEGER
FGLCALENDAR_TYPE_DOTS INTEGER
FGLCALENDAR_TYPE_ICON INTEGER
FGLCALENDAR_TYPE_TEXT INTEGER

FUNCTION Summary

Adds a date to the selected dates of the given calendar

Clears the list of selected dates for the given calendar

Extracts selected date info from the web component field value.

Returns the current month set for the last calendar display.

Defines if day numbers must be displayed in the calendar.

Defines if today must be rendered in the calendar.

Defines if the calendar must show week numbers on the left.

Constants

FGLCALENDAR_THEME_AMAZON

CONSTANT FGLCALENDAR_THEME_AMAZON INTEGER = 4

FGLCALENDAR_THEME_CHILI

CONSTANT FGLCALENDAR_THEME_CHILI INTEGER = 6

FGLCALENDAR_THEME_DEFAULT

CONSTANT FGLCALENDAR_THEME_DEFAULT INTEGER = 1

FGLCALENDAR_THEME_PACIFIC

CONSTANT FGLCALENDAR_THEME_PACIFIC INTEGER = 3

FGLCALENDAR_THEME_SAHARA

CONSTANT FGLCALENDAR_THEME_SAHARA INTEGER = 2

FGLCALENDAR_THEME_VIOLA

CONSTANT FGLCALENDAR_THEME_VIOLA INTEGER = 5

FGLCALENDAR_TYPE_DEFAULT

CONSTANT FGLCALENDAR_TYPE_DEFAULT INTEGER = 1

FGLCALENDAR_TYPE_DOTS

CONSTANT FGLCALENDAR_TYPE_DOTS INTEGER = 4

FGLCALENDAR_TYPE_ICON

CONSTANT FGLCALENDAR_TYPE_ICON INTEGER = 2

FGLCALENDAR_TYPE_TEXT

CONSTANT FGLCALENDAR_TYPE_TEXT INTEGER = 3

Functions

addSelectedDate

FUNCTION addSelectedDate(id SMALLINT, value DATE)

Adds a date to the selected dates of the given calendar

Parameters:
id - The calendar id
value - A DATE value

clearSelectedDates

FUNCTION clearSelectedDates(id SMALLINT)

Clears the list of selected dates for the given calendar

Parameters:
id - The calendar id

create

FUNCTION create(name STRING) RETURNS INTEGER

Create a new calendar web component and return its ID

This function create a new calendar object and returns its ID. The calendar ID will be used in other functions to identify a calendar object. The function requires the name of the form field defining the WEBCOMPONENT form item.

 DEFINE id INTEGER
 LET id = fglcalendar.create("formonly.mycalendar")

Parameters:
name - The name of the WEBCOMPONENT form field.
Returns:
The calendar object ID

destroy

FUNCTION destroy(id INTEGER)

Destroy a calendar object

This function releases all resources allocated for the calendar.

Parameters:
id - The calendar id

display

FUNCTION display(id SMALLINT, cy SMALLINT, cm SMALLINT)

Displays the calendar in the web component field

Parameters:
id - The calendar id
cy - The current year (4 digits)
cm - The current month (1-12)

finalize

FUNCTION finalize()

Library finalization function.

This function has to be called when the library is not longer used.

getSelectedDateFromValue

FUNCTION getSelectedDateFromValue(id SMALLINT, value STRING)

Extracts selected date info from the web component field value.

This function can be called with the value of the web component field as parameter, after the selection action was fired, in order to get the last date selected by the user.

 CALL getSelectedDateFromValue(id, value)

Parameters:
id - The calendar id
value - The JSON-formatted string value returned in the calendar web component field.

getViewMonth

FUNCTION getViewMonth(id SMALLINT)

Returns the current month set for the last calendar display.

Parameters:
id - The calendar id

getViewYear

FUNCTION getViewYear(id SMALLINT)

Returns the current year set for the last calendar display.

Parameters:
id - The calendar id

initialize

FUNCTION initialize()

Library initialization function.

This function has to be called before using other functions of this module.

isSelectedDate

FUNCTION isSelectedDate(id SMALLINT, value DATE)

Check if a date is selected for the given calendar

Parameters:
id - The calendar id
value - A DATE value

removeSelectedDate

FUNCTION removeSelectedDate(id SMALLINT, value DATE)

Remove a date from the selected dates of the given calendar

Parameters:
id - The calendar id
value - A DATE value

setColorTheme

FUNCTION setColorTheme(id SMALLINT, theme SMALLINT)

Defines the view type of the calendar.

Parameters:
id - The calendar id
theme - The color theme, can be: FGLCALENDAR_THEME_DEFAULT, FGLCALENDAR_THEME_SAHARA, FGLCALENDAR_THEME_PACIFIC, FGLCALENDAR_THEME_AMAZON, FGLCALENDAR_THEME_VIOLA, FGLCALENDAR_THEME_CHILI

setDayCellColor

FUNCTION setDayCellColor(id SMALLINT, color STRING)

Defines the color for the day cells in the current month.

Parameters:
id - The calendar id
color - The color (#RRGGBB)

setDayCellSize

FUNCTION setDayCellSize(id SMALLINT, rw SMALLINT, rh SMALLINT)

Defines the relative size of calendar cells.

Parameters:
id - The calendar id
rw - Relative width
rh - Relative heiht

setDayNames

FUNCTION setDayNames(id SMALLINT, names STRING)

Defines the names for the days (for localization).

By default, texts are in English, using this function to define localized day names, in the character set of your choice. The list of day names must be provided as string contained a comma-separated names.

 CALL setDayNames(id, "M|T|W|T|F|S|S")

Parameters:
id - The calendar id
names - The list of day names

setDayOffCellColor

FUNCTION setDayOffCellColor(id SMALLINT, color STRING)

Defines the color for the days off (Sat / Sun)

Parameters:
id - The calendar id
color - The color (#RRGGBB)

setDayOutCellColor

FUNCTION setDayOutCellColor(id SMALLINT, color STRING)

Defines the color for the days out of current month

Parameters:
id - The calendar id
color - The color (#RRGGBB)

setDaySelectedCellColor

FUNCTION setDaySelectedCellColor(id SMALLINT, color STRING)

Defines the color for the selected days

Parameters:
id - The calendar id
color - The color (#RRGGBB)

setDayTodayCellColor

FUNCTION setDayTodayCellColor(id SMALLINT, color STRING)

Defines the color for the current day cell (today).

Parameters:
id - The calendar id
color - The color (#RRGGBB)

setViewType

FUNCTION setViewType(id SMALLINT, type SMALLINT)

Defines the view type of the calendar.

Parameters:
id - The calendar id
type - The view type, can be: FGLCALENDAR_TYPE_DEFAULT, FGLCALENDAR_TYPE_ICON, FGLCALENDAR_TYPE_TEXT, FGLCALENDAR_TYPE_DOTS

showDayNames

FUNCTION showDayNames(id SMALLINT, show BOOLEAN)

Defines if day names must be displayed in the calendar.

Default is TRUE.

Parameters:
id - The calendar id
show - A boolean to indicate if day names must be displayed

showDayNumbers

FUNCTION showDayNumbers(id SMALLINT, show BOOLEAN)

Defines if day numbers must be displayed in the calendar.

Default is TRUE.

Parameters:
id - The calendar id
show - A boolean to indicate if day numbers must be displayed

showToday

FUNCTION showToday(id SMALLINT, show BOOLEAN)

Defines if today must be rendered in the calendar.

Default is TRUE.

Parameters:
id - The calendar id
show - A boolean to indicate if today must be rendered

showWeekNumbers

FUNCTION showWeekNumbers(id SMALLINT, show BOOLEAN)

Defines if the calendar must show week numbers on the left.

Default is FALSE.

Parameters:
id - The calendar id
show - A boolean to indicate if week numbers must be rendered
